name: PsychoanalysisAndIndividualPsychotherapyExcludingPsychotherapyForCrisisCPT
title: Psychoanalysis and Individual Psychotherapy Excluding Psychotherapy for Crisis (CPT)
description: This value set contains CPT concepts for psychoanalysis and individual psychotherapy  with or without family member, excluding psychotherapy provided with medical evaluation and management services and psychotherapy provided for crisis.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains CPT concepts for psychoanalysis and individual psychotherapy with or without family member, excluding psychotherapy provided with medical evaluation and management services  and psychotherapy provided for crisis.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have participated in psychoanalysis or individual psychotherapy  either with or without family member. This element may map to the "Encounter" or "Intervention" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes individual psychotherapy with or without family member. Includes psychoanalysis.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes psychotherapy provided with medical evaluation and management services. Excludes psychotherapy for crisis. Excludes group, family, and multi-family psychotherapy.)
